conversations.content: Open my daily-journal.md file in a new split pane.

tool_call: vaultManager_openNote
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731427600000_p9q0r1s2t", "workspaceId": "ws_1731427600000_u3v4w5x6y", "sessionDescription": "Opening daily journal", "sessionMemory": "User accessing journal for daily entry", "toolContext": "Open journal in split view", "primaryGoal": "Access daily journal", "subgoal": "Open in split pane"}, "path": "Journal/daily-journal.md", "mode": "split", "focus": true}
Make a copy of my template.md file as new-project-template.md.
Rename the Archives folder to Archive-2024.

tool_call: vaultManager_editFolder
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731428400000_j5k6l7m8n", "workspaceId": "ws_1731428400000_o9p0q1r2s", "sessionDescription": "Renaming Archives folder", "sessionMemory": "User updating folder naming convention", "toolContext": "Rename folder to include year", "primaryGoal": "Update folder name", "subgoal": "Rename Archives to Archive-2024"}, "path": "Archives", "newPath": "Archive-2024"}
Remove the draft-post.md note from my Blog folder.
Relocate the Reference folder from Docs to the vault root.

tool_call: vaultManager_moveFolder
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731429200000_d1e2f3g4h", "workspaceId": "ws_1731429200000_i5j6k7l8m", "sessionDescription": "Moving Reference folder", "sessionMemory": "User restructuring vault organization", "toolContext": "Relocate Reference to root level", "primaryGoal": "Reorganize vault structure", "subgoal": "Move Reference folder to root"}, "path": "Docs/Reference", "newPath": "Reference"}
Result: {"success": true, "path": "Reference", "moved": true}

tool_call: vaultManager_listDirectory
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731429200000_d1e2f3g4h", "workspaceId": "ws_1731429200000_i5j6k7l8m", "sessionDescription": "Verifying Reference folder", "sessionMemory": "Moved Reference folder to root", "toolContext": "Check Reference folder contents", "primaryGoal": "Verify folder move", "subgoal": "List Reference contents"}, "path": "Reference", "includeFiles": true, "includeFolders": true, "depth": 0}
Result: {"success": true, "contents": [{"name": "api-docs.md", "type": "file"}, {"name": "glossary.md", "type": "file"}]}
List all markdown files in my Tutorials directory.

tool_call: vaultManager_listDirectory
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731429600000_n9o0p1q2r", "workspaceId": "ws_1731429600000_s3t4u5v6w", "sessionDescription": "Listing tutorial files", "sessionMemory": "User reviewing tutorial content", "toolContext": "List markdown files only", "primaryGoal": "Review tutorials", "subgoal": "List .md files in Tutorials"}, "path": "Tutorials", "filter": "*.md", "includeFiles": true, "includeFolders": false, "depth": 0}
Create a nested folder structure: Knowledge/CS/Algorithms.
Move weekly-review.md from Drafts to Reviews folder.
Duplicate my client-proposal.md and name it client-proposal-v2.md.

tool_call: vaultManager_duplicateNote
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731430800000_r3s4t5u6v", "workspaceId": "ws_1731430800000_w7x8y9z0a", "sessionDescription": "Creating proposal version 2", "sessionMemory": "User iterating on client proposal", "toolContext": "Duplicate for new version", "primaryGoal": "Create proposal iteration", "subgoal": "Duplicate to v2 file"}, "sourcePath": "Proposals/client-proposal.md", "targetPath": "Proposals/client-proposal-v2.md"}
Delete my test-folder and everything inside it.
Open my project-roadmap.md without switching focus to it.

tool_call: vaultManager_openNote
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731431600000_l9m0n1o2p", "workspaceId": "ws_1731431600000_q3r4s5t6u", "sessionDescription": "Opening roadmap reference", "sessionMemory": "User needs roadmap accessible but not focused", "toolContext": "Open roadmap in background", "primaryGoal": "Reference project roadmap", "subgoal": "Open without focus"}, "path": "Planning/project-roadmap.md", "mode": "tab", "focus": false}
Show me just the folders in my root directory, not files.
Result: {"success": true, "folders": ["Projects", "Archive", "Templates", "Research"]}
Rename my Notes folder to Knowledge-Base.

tool_call: vaultManager_editFolder
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731432400000_f5g6h7i8j", "workspaceId": "ws_1731432400000_k9l0m1n2o", "sessionDescription": "Renaming Notes folder", "sessionMemory": "User rebranding note organization", "toolContext": "Rename to Knowledge-Base", "primaryGoal": "Update folder naming", "subgoal": "Rename Notes folder"}, "path": "Notes", "newPath": "Knowledge-Base"}
Make a copy of my meeting-template.md for tomorrow's standup.
Remove the unused.md file from my vault root.

tool_call: vaultManager_deleteNote
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731433200000_z1a2b3c4d", "workspaceId": "ws_1731433200000_e5f6g7h8i", "sessionDescription": "Deleting unused file", "sessionMemory": "User cleaning up root directory", "toolContext": "Remove unused note", "primaryGoal": "Clean vault root", "subgoal": "Delete unused.md"}, "path": "unused.md"}
Move my Projects/WebApp folder to Projects/Archive/WebApp.
Show me everything in my Meetings folder including subfolders.

tool_call: vaultManager_listDirectory
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731434000000_t7u8v9w0x", "workspaceId": "ws_1731434000000_y1z2a3b4c", "sessionDescription": "Listing meetings recursively", "sessionMemory": "User reviewing all meeting notes", "toolContext": "Deep list of Meetings folder", "primaryGoal": "Review all meetings", "subgoal": "List with subfolders"}, "path": "Meetings", "includeFiles": true, "includeFolders": true, "depth": 3}
Create a Resources folder under my Learning directory.
Result: {"success": true, "opened": "dashboard.md"}
Create an agent called CodeReviewer to help me review pull requests.

tool_call: agentManager_createAgent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731435200000_x1y2z3a4b", "workspaceId": "ws_1731435200000_c5d6e7f8g", "sessionDescription": "Creating code review agent", "sessionMemory": "User wants automated PR review assistance", "toolContext": "Set up new CodeReviewer agent", "primaryGoal": "Create code review agent", "subgoal": "Initialize CodeReviewer"}, "name": "CodeReviewer", "description": "Expert code reviewer for pull requests", "prompt": "You are an expert code reviewer. Analyze code for bugs, performance issues, and best practices. Provide constructive feedback.", "model": "claude-3-5-sonnet-20241022", "enabled": true}
Show me all my available AI agents.
Disable my TestAgent - I'm done testing.

tool_call: agentManager_toggleAgent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731436000000_r7s8t9u0v", "workspaceId": "ws_1731436000000_w1x2y3z4a", "sessionDescription": "Disabling test agent", "sessionMemory": "User completed testing phase", "toolContext": "Turn off TestAgent", "primaryGoal": "Disable test agent", "subgoal": "Toggle TestAgent off"}, "id": "agent_test_2024"}
Generate a banner image for my blog post about AI ethics.
What AI models do I have access to?

tool_call: agentManager_listModels
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731436800000_l3m4n5o6p", "workspaceId": "ws_1731436800000_q7r8s9t0u", "sessionDescription": "Listing available models", "sessionMemory": "User exploring model options", "toolContext": "Show accessible AI models", "primaryGoal": "View available models", "subgoal": "List all models"}, "provider": "anthropic"}
Run a prompt asking: 'Summarize the key findings from my research notes'.
Get the details for my WritingAssistant agent.

tool_call: agentManager_getAgent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731437600000_f9g0h1i2j", "workspaceId": "ws_1731437600000_k3l4m5n6o", "sessionDescription": "Fetching agent details", "sessionMemory": "User checking WritingAssistant configuration", "toolContext": "Retrieve agent info", "primaryGoal": "View agent details", "subgoal": "Get WritingAssistant info"}, "id": "agent_writing_assistant"}
Update my SummaryBot agent to use Claude Opus instead of Sonnet.
